ValidationRule.description: Alerts a user to the necessity of a start time or estimate needed if an event is scheduled or later in its work process.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ((ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Scheduled") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Venue Set") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Program Set") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"In-Production") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Completed")) && (Event_End_Date__c > TODAY()) && (ISPICKVAL( Event_Start_Time__c,"")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a start time or estimate
